full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 666 Filed 06/21/22 Page 2 of 2

Accordingly, we request that Ms. Ransome and Ms. Stein be given an opportunity to speak at the Maxwell sentencing,

Very truly yours,

Robert Y. Lewis
Robert Y. Lewis

Cc: mcohen@cohengresser.com lmenninger@hmflaw.com bcsternheim@mac.com smccawley@bsfllp.com alison.moe@usdoj.gov maurene.comey@usdoj.gov lara.pomerantz@usdoj.gov ktownsend@rcfp.org

DOJ-OGR-00010529

additional_notes: The document appears to be a formal letter from Robert Y. Lewis regarding a court case involving Maxwell. The letter is well-formatted and free of handwritten text or stamps.
